invite.alreadyInPool: You are already a member of a pool. You need to leave your current pool before joining a new one.
invite.alreadyNominating: You are already nominating these validators.
invite.alreadyNominatingOthers: You are already nominating other validators.
invite.alreadyNominatingThese: You are already nominating these validators.
invite.bondDescription: Choose how many {{unit}} you would like to stake. You can increase or decrease this amount later.
invite.connectWalletToNominate: Please connect a wallet to nominate validators.
invite.errorFetchingPool: Error fetching pool details. The pool may not exist or there was a network issue.
invite.errorFetchingValidators: Error fetching validator details. There may be a network issue.
invite.errorLoadingPool: There was an error loading the pool details. The pool may no longer exist or may not be available on this network.
invite.invalidNetwork: Invalid network specified in invite link
invite.inviteNotificationDescription: Someone has shared an invitation with you to participate in staking. Click 'View Invite' to see the details and take action.
invite.invitedToJoinPool: You've Been Invited to Join a Pool
invite.invitedToNominateMultiple: You've Been Invited to Nominate {{count}} Validators
invite.invitedToNominateSingle: You've Been Invited to Nominate a Validator
invite.noCurrentNominations: You are not currently staking - please join a pool or nominate validators
invite.noPoolsFound: You are not a member of any pools
invite.noValidatorsFound: You are not nominating any validators
invite.noValidatorsInUrlDescription: No validator addresses were found in the URL. Please make sure you have a valid invite link.
invite.payoutDestinationInfo: Choose where your staking rewards will be sent. By default, they will be added to your stash balance.
invite.poolInviteDescription: Join this pool to stake your tokens and earn rewards as part of a collective staking group.
invite.selectPoolLabel: Choose a pool to invite to
invite.sharePoolInviteDescription: Share this link to invite others to join this pool
invite.shareValidatorInviteDescription: Share this link to invite others to nominate these validators
invite.validatorInviteDescription: Nominate these validators to stake your tokens and earn rewards.
invite.wrongNetwork: This invite is for the {{expected}} network, but you are currently on {{current}}. Please switch networks to continue.
invite.youHaveBeenInvitedToJoinPool: You've been invited to join a staking pool
invite.youHaveBeenInvitedToNominate: You've been invited to nominate validators
